conciergeDescription: Keep concierge enquiries turned on to get matched with couples based on their preferences. This increases your chances of connecting with couples who are most likely to be interested in your services.
conciergeOptOut.upgradeDescription: Choose to opt in or opt out of Bridebook concierge enquiries
followUpMessages.cancelWarning.text: This follow-up message has unsaved changes. Do you want to proceed?
followUpMessages.cancelWarning.title: Discard changes?
followUpMessages.deleteWarning.text: You won't be able to recover it and will lose <2>all scheduled follow-ups using this template</2>.
followUpMessages.deleteWarning.title: Delete this follow-up?
followUpMessages.description: Create reusable follow-up templates and then schedule them on an enquiry page to automatically chase a couple after a specific time period. Follow-up messages are sent only if the couple doesn't reply. It's a quick and easy way to re-engage couples and keep the conversation going on Bridebook.
followUpMessages.title: Follow-up Templates
followUpMessages.unlockWithVenueProText: Explore your upgrade options to create automatic follow-up messages and get more replies from couples.
messageTemplates.cancelWarning.text: This template has unsaved changes. Do you want to proceed?
messageTemplates.cancelWarning.title: Discard changes?
messageTemplates.deleteWarning.text: You won't be able to recover it.
messageTemplates.deleteWarning.title: Delete this template?
messageTemplates.description: Create pre-defined messages that you can use as a base instead of creating a new message each time from scratch. Templates are also handy for making sure messages follow brand guidelines. Use Smart Variables to personalise your response and increase couple response rate.
messageTemplates.title: Message Templates
pages.title: Enquiry settings
